message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about $16,500?  This would allow me to make a fair profit while still being a good price for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with $16,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
